headline: Democratic group runs ad hitting Ron Johnson over Trump 2017 tax bill
author: Julia Manchester
sentences: The investigation referred to in the ad was conducted by the Congressional Integrity Project, which suggested in 2020 that Johnson's changes to the Trump 2017 legislation would have benefited businesses like Pacur LLC, which Johnson previously owned and held a financial stake in until 2020.
